stateof - the - art baseline SNet.from sentence: In these experimental results , we see that PAAG achieves a 111 % , 8 % and 62.73 % increment over the stateof - the - art baseline SNet in terms of BLEU , embedding greedy and consistency score , respectively .

in.from sentence: In , we see that our PAAG outperforms all the baseline significantly in semantic distance with respect to the ground truth .

other baseline models.from sentence: In , we can see that PAAG outperforms other baseline models in both sentence fluency and consistency with the facts .

find.from sentence: Although there is a small increment of S2 SAR with respect to S2SA in all metrics , we still find a noticeable gap between S2SAR and PAAG .
